thread.title: Mexico protests deadly Egypt attack on tourists
thread.title_full: Mexico protests deadly Egypt attack on tourists | News24

author: news24.com
title: Mexico protests deadly Egypt attack on tourists
text:
Cairo - Egyptian security forces killed 12 Mexicans and Egyptians and injured 10 "by accident" on Monday in an attack after mistaking a tourist convoy for militants they were pursuing in the country's western desert, the ministry of interior said.
At least two Mexicans were killed, Mexico's foreign ministry said in a statement, though Egyptian security sources later said that eight Mexicans and four Egyptians were killed, and eight Mexicans and two Egyptians were wounded, judicial and security sources said.
The tourist group of 22 had parked their four four-by-four vehicles off road for a barbecue near the Bahariya oasis, a tourist site in the western desert, when army aircraft suddenly began strafing them, security sources said.
As members of the tourist convoy tried to flee, additional security forces on the ground fired on them.
